answers.answer: It could be the postal service!! It stinks by me. Call you doctor and ask about your lab work.
That's what I would do, give them a call. Make sure to write your numbers down and ask for a copy next time you go in.Jon

question: I had bloodwork done a week ago to check my cholesterol and I am assuming for diabetes as well and I have heard nothing and received nothing in the mail. Last time they checked my cholesterol I heard back in 2 days. Why the wait? If someone could help me with this it would be much appreciated.
title: how long for cholesterol results
